official.headline: Compliance Scores Updated
official.anchor_line: Citywide BCI recalibration adjusts access levels for enhanced systemic balance.
official.contextual_reframing: Dynamic score assessments reflect our commitment to fair, adaptive governance for every citizen.

official.headline: Public Order Upheld
official.anchor_line: Demonstrations in the old administrative sector addressed swiftly under BCI guidance.
official.contextual_reframing: Rapid response highlights the system’s capacity to manage change smoothly and promote public stability.

underground.headline: Power Shuffle Exposed
underground.anchor_line: Top council insiders wake up locked out, while so-called 'restored' citizens get promoted overnight.
underground.contextual_reframing: The system isn’t neutral—somebody’s rewriting the rules from the shadows, and the winners aren’t who you think.

underground.headline: Protesters Silenced Fast
underground.anchor_line: Old guard officials try to protest their purge—the BCI slams them, cuts their access, and calls it ‘stability.’
underground.contextual_reframing: Order means whoever’s loudest gets shut down first. If it can happen to them, it can happen to anyone.
